item.title: Paul Stookey
item.description: Noel Paul Stookey is an American singer-songwriter. Stookey is known as 'Paul' in the folk trio Peter, Paul and Mary; however, he has been known by his first name, Noel, throughout his life. He continues to work as a singer and an activist, performing as a solo artist, and occasionally performing with Peter Yarrow.

item.title: Peter Yarrow
item.description: Peter Yarrow is an American singer and songwriter who found fame with the 1960s folk music trio Peter, Paul and Mary. Yarrow co-wrote one of the group's greatest hits, 'Puff, the Magic Dragon'. He is also a political activist and has supported causes that range from opposition to the Vietnam War to support for school anti-bullying programs.
